languages.text: "Да ладно. Вспомни, какой она была, дядюшка Абеляр", {n}— Идира невесело и как-то очень мудро усмехается.{/n} "Дерзкой. Уверенной в себе. Она будто всю жизнь наперегонки с судьбой неслась, пока судьба ее не настигла. Она бы и в черную дыру нырнула, если б считала, что это ей нужно, чтоб быть на шаг впереди всех в Просторе. Знать бы только, что она у себя в столе держала и зачем за этим кинулась в разгар атаки..."

traits.locale_text: "Да ладно. Вспомни, какой она была, дядюшка Абеляр", {n}— Идира невесело и как-то очень мудро усмехается.{/n} "Дерзкой. Уверенной в себе. Она будто всю жизнь наперегонки с судьбой неслась, пока судьба ее не настигла. Она бы и в черную дыру нырнула, если б считала, что это ей нужно, чтоб быть на шаг впереди всех в Просторе. Знать бы только, что она у себя в столе держала и зачем за этим кинулась в разгар атаки..."

languages.text: "Come on now, Abelard. Remember what she was like." {n}Idira's smile betrays her grief, but, at the same time, is strangely knowing.{/n} "Brazen. Assertive. It was like her entire life was a race against fate until fate caught up with her in the end. She would've gone headfirst into a black hole if she had thought it would put her even one step ahead of everyone else out in the Expanse. If we could just find out what she was keeping in her desk and why she went to get it during the attack..."

languages.text: «Vamos, Abelard. Recuerde cómo era». {n}La sonrisa de Idira no casa con su dolor, pero al mismo tiempo, es extrañamente cómplice.{/n} «Audaz y decidida. Era como si llevara toda su vida echándole una carrera al destino hasta que este acabó alcanzándola. Se habría sumergido de cabeza en un agujero negro si se le ocurriera que con ello obtendría ventaja frente al resto en la Extensión. Si lográramos descubrir qué guardaba en su escritorio y por qué fue a buscarlo durante el ataque...».
languages.original_text: "Come on now, Abelard. Remember what she was like." {n}Idira's smile betrays her grief, but, at the same time, is strangely knowing.{/n} "Brazen. Assertive. It was like her entire life was a race against fate until fate caught up with her in the end. She would've gone headfirst into a black hole if she had thought it would put her even one step ahead of everyone else out in the Expanse. If we could just find out what she was keeping in her desk and why she went to get it during the attack..."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos, Abelard. Recuerde cómo era». {n}La sonrisa de Idira no casa con su dolor, pero al mismo tiempo, es extrañamente cómplice.{/n} «Audaz y decidida. Era como si llevara toda su vida echándole una carrera al destino hasta que este acabó alcanzándola. Se habría sumergido de cabeza en un agujero negro si se le ocurriera que con ello obtendría ventaja frente al resto en la Extensión. Si lográramos descubrir qué guardaba en su escritorio y por qué fue a buscarlo durante el ataque...».

languages.text: "Nun kommt, Abelard. Erinnert Euch daran, wie sie war." {n}Idiras Mundwinkel verziehen sich zu einem traurigen, auf merkwürdige Weise aber auch wissenden Lächeln.{/n} "Kühn. Durchsetzungsfähig. Ihr gesamtes Leben war im Grunde ein Rennen gegen das Schicksal, bis das Schicksal sie am Ende eingeholt hat. Sie hätte sich kopfüber in ein schwarzes Loch gestürzt, wenn sie geglaubt hätte, dass ihr das auch nur einen einzigen Schritt Vorsprung gegenüber allen anderen in der Ausdehnung verschafft. Wenn wir doch nur herausfinden könnten, was sie in ihrem Schreibtisch aufbewahrt hat und warum sie es während des Angriffs holen wollte ..."
languages.original_text: "Come on now, Abelard. Remember what she was like." {n}Idira's smile betrays her grief, but, at the same time, is strangely knowing.{/n} "Brazen. Assertive. It was like her entire life was a race against fate until fate caught up with her in the end. She would've gone headfirst into a black hole if she had thought it would put her even one step ahead of everyone else out in the Expanse. If we could just find out what she was keeping in her desk and why she went to get it during the attack..."

traits.locale_text: "Nun kommt, Abelard. Erinnert Euch daran, wie sie war." {n}Idiras Mundwinkel verziehen sich zu einem traurigen, auf merkwürdige Weise aber auch wissenden Lächeln.{/n} "Kühn. Durchsetzungsfähig. Ihr gesamtes Leben war im Grunde ein Rennen gegen das Schicksal, bis das Schicksal sie am Ende eingeholt hat. Sie hätte sich kopfüber in ein schwarzes Loch gestürzt, wenn sie geglaubt hätte, dass ihr das auch nur einen einzigen Schritt Vorsprung gegenüber allen anderen in der Ausdehnung verschafft. Wenn wir doch nur herausfinden könnten, was sie in ihrem Schreibtisch aufbewahrt hat und warum sie es während des Angriffs holen wollte ..."

languages.text: « Allons, Abélard. Vous savez bien comment elle était. » {n}Le sourire d'Idira trahit son chagrin, mais il semble aussi étrangement entendu.{/n} « Effrontée. Sûre d'elle. Comme si sa vie n'était qu'une longue course pour échapper à son destin, avant que celui-ci ne finisse par la rattraper. Elle aurait plongé tête la première dans un trou noir si cela lui aurait permis de prendre l'ascendant sur les autres dans les Étendues. Si seulement nous pouvions savoir ce qu'elle cachait dans son bureau, et pourquoi elle est partie le chercher pendant l'attaque... »
languages.original_text: "Come on now, Abelard. Remember what she was like." {n}Idira's smile betrays her grief, but, at the same time, is strangely knowing.{/n} "Brazen. Assertive. It was like her entire life was a race against fate until fate caught up with her in the end. She would've gone headfirst into a black hole if she had thought it would put her even one step ahead of everyone else out in the Expanse. If we could just find out what she was keeping in her desk and why she went to get it during the attack..."

traits.locale_text: « Allons, Abélard. Vous savez bien comment elle était. » {n}Le sourire d'Idira trahit son chagrin, mais il semble aussi étrangement entendu.{/n} « Effrontée. Sûre d'elle. Comme si sa vie n'était qu'une longue course pour échapper à son destin, avant que celui-ci ne finisse par la rattraper. Elle aurait plongé tête la première dans un trou noir si cela lui aurait permis de prendre l'ascendant sur les autres dans les Étendues. Si seulement nous pouvions savoir ce qu'elle cachait dans son bureau, et pourquoi elle est partie le chercher pendant l'attaque... »

languages.text: “冷静点吧，阿贝拉德，想想她生前是什么样子吧。”{n}伊迪拉的笑容中流露出悲伤，但又显得如此心照不宣。{/n}“她我行我素，自信果决，仿佛一辈子都在和命运赛跑，直到命运最后追上她。她甚至敢一头扎进黑洞，只要她认为这么做可以让她在整个科罗努斯扩区领先一步。如果能搞清楚她的书桌上放的是什么东西就好了。真希望能弄明白，为什么她在遭到袭击的时候，还要去拿那个东西……”
languages.original_text: "Come on now, Abelard. Remember what she was like." {n}Idira's smile betrays her grief, but, at the same time, is strangely knowing.{/n} "Brazen. Assertive. It was like her entire life was a race against fate until fate caught up with her in the end. She would've gone headfirst into a black hole if she had thought it would put her even one step ahead of everyone else out in the Expanse. If we could just find out what she was keeping in her desk and why she went to get it during the attack..."

languages.text: 「ねえ、アベラルド。あの人の性格を思い出してみなさいよ」{n}イディラは笑顔で悲しみを隠すと同時に、妙に訳知り顔で言葉を続ける。{/n}「大胆不敵。自信過剰。運命が最後に追いつくまで、あの人の人生はまるで運命との追いかけっこみたいだった。エクスパンスの誰よりも先を行けると思えば、真っ先にブラックホールに突っ込むような人だったわ。あの人が机の中に隠していたものの正体、そして襲撃中にそれを取りに行った理由が分かったなら…」
languages.original_text: "Come on now, Abelard. Remember what she was like." {n}Idira's smile betrays her grief, but, at the same time, is strangely knowing.{/n} "Brazen. Assertive. It was like her entire life was a race against fate until fate caught up with her in the end. She would've gone headfirst into a black hole if she had thought it would put her even one step ahead of everyone else out in the Expanse. If we could just find out what she was keeping in her desk and why she went to get it during the attack..."

traits.locale_text: 「ねえ、アベラルド。あの人の人柄を思い出してみなさいよ」{n}イディラは笑顔で悲しみを隠すと同時に、妙に訳知り顔で言葉を続ける。{/n}「大胆不敵。自信過剰。最後に運命が追いつくまで、あの人の人生はまるで運命との追いかけっこみたいだった。エクスパンスの誰よりも先を行けると思えば、真っ先にブラックホールに突っ込むような人だったわ。あの人が机の中に隠していたものの正体、そして襲撃中にそれを取りに行った理由が分かったなら…」

「ねえ、アベラルド。あの人の性格を思い出してみなさいよ」{n}イディラは笑顔で悲しみを隠すと同時に、妙に訳知り顔で言葉を続ける。{/n}「大胆不敵。自信過剰。運命が最後に追いつくまで、あの人の人生はまるで運命との追いかけっこみたいだった。エクスパンスの誰よりも先を行けると思えば、真っ先にブラックホールに突っ込むような人だったわ。あの人が机の中に隠していたものの正体、そして襲撃中にそれを取りに行った理由が分かったなら…」

languages.text: "Yapma Abelard. Hatırlasana nasıl bir kadındı." {n}İdira'nın gülüşü, altında yatan kederi saklayamasa da garip bir şekilde hakikatin farkında.{/n} "Sınır tanımazdı, iddialıydı. Sanki tüm ömrü kadere karşı bir yarıştı ama gün geldi o kader yakasına yapıştı. Enginlik'teki diğerlerinden bir adım öne geçeceğini bilse kara deliğe bile düşünmeden atlardı. Masasındaki şeyin ne olduğunu ve saldırı esnasında neden onu almak için odasına döndüğünü öğrenebilirsek..."
languages.original_text: "Come on now, Abelard. Remember what she was like." {n}Idira's smile betrays her grief, but, at the same time, is strangely knowing.{/n} "Brazen. Assertive. It was like her entire life was a race against fate until fate caught up with her in the end. She would've gone headfirst into a black hole if she had thought it would put her even one step ahead of everyone else out in the Expanse. If we could just find out what she was keeping in her desk and why she went to get it during the attack..."

Sanki tüm ömrü kadere karşı bir yarıştı ama gün geldi o kader yakasına yapıştı. Enginlik'teki diğerlerinden bir adım öne geçeceğini bilse kara deliğe bile düşünmeden atlardı. Masasındaki şeyin ne olduğunu ve saldırı esnasında neden onu almak için odasına döndüğünü öğrenebilirsek..."
